meanings.definition: A plant of the poppy family with bright yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The celandine in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of celandine for my mother.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used celandine petals to decorate its nest.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a celandine in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The field was a sea of celandine, painting the landscape in yellow.

meanings.definition: A yellow pigment obtained from the plant celandine.
meanings.sent1: The artist used celandine to create a vibrant painting.
meanings.sent2: The ancient manuscript was adorned with intricate celandine illustrations.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the celandine pigment for food.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, filling it with the warmth of celandine.
meanings.sent5: The sunset cast a celandine hue over the horizon, painting the sky in gold.

meanings.definition: A yellow color resembling that of the celandine plant.
meanings.sent1: The walls of the room were painted in a cheerful celandine shade.
meanings.sent2: She wore a dress the color of celandine to the spring festival.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel left tiny footprints in the celandine-colored sand.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was as bright and warm as the celandine hue of the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The room glowed with a celandine light, creating a cozy atmosphere.
